articles.title: The Patriots beat the Falcons, but they made it more difficult than necessary
articles.description:
Can’t learn from mistakes unless you make a few, right?

The post The Patriots beat the Falcons, but they made it more difficult than necessary appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots secured a win against the Falcons on November 3, 2025.
Team struggled with execution, making the game unnecessarily challenging for fans.
Local fans express concern over the team's performance ahead of upcoming games.

articles.title: Two Red Sox outfielders earn Gold Glove Awards
articles.description:
This marks the first time that the Red Sox have had multiple Gold Glove winners in the same season since 2018.

The post Two Red Sox outfielders earn Gold Glove Awards appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Wilyer Abreu and Ceddanne Rafaela win Gold Glove Awards for the Red Sox.
This is the first time since 2018 that Boston has multiple winners.
Enhanced defensive skills may boost Red Sox performance in upcoming seasons.
